feature.label: SWI Prolog CLI Enabler
feature.license:
This feature contains multiple components involving multiple licenses.
SWI Prolog: Simplified BSD (https://www.swi-prolog.org/license.html) libgmp (linked from SWI prolog binary): LGPL (https://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl-3.0.html) Apache Commons Compress: Apache 2.0 (https://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0) Apache Commons IO: Apache 2.0 (https://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0) Apache Commons Lang3: Apache 2.0 (https://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0)
We apply to most restrictive license to the whole bundle, which is LGPL.
